
``select_expression_values``
================================

select_expression_values

Description
-----------

select_expression_values

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   select_expression_values(...)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``...``
     - Arguments passed on to `\ ``get_expression_values`` <#getexpressionvalues>`_   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("spat_unit")), list("spatial unit")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("feat_type")), list("feature type")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("values")), list("expression values to extract")), "\n", "  ")


Seealso
-------

`\ ``get_expression_values`` <#getexpressionvalues>`_
